title: Axiom Watch Faces
summary: A set of digital watch faces for Android Wear.
developerAddress:
Budivelnykiv str. 18 apt. 38
Svitlovodsk, Kirovohrad,
Ukraine
description: A collection of 5 minimalistic digital watch faces to customize look of your Android Wear watch.8-BIT -- round-shaped pixels create that unforgettable old-school font from days that you will never return.CATHODE -- with this watch face you can almost touch every pixel of old CRT monitor.HEX -- a futuristic digital bee hive. Bees are not included.SEGMENTED -- will turn your watch into retro alarm clock with bright segmented digits.TINY -- made with a smallest and cutest 3x5 pixels font.All watch faces can work in either 24-hr or 12-hr mode and can be customized by changing colors of background and digits.
descriptionHTML:
A collection of 5 minimalistic digital watch faces to customize look of your Android Wear watch.



8-BIT -- round-shaped pixels create that unforgettable old-school font from days that you will never return.

CATHODE -- with this watch face you can almost touch every pixel of old CRT monitor.

HEX -- a futuristic digital bee hive. Bees are not included.

SEGMENTED -- will turn your watch into retro alarm clock with bright segmented digits.

TINY -- made with a smallest and cutest 3x5 pixels font.

All watch faces can work in either 24-hr or 12-hr mode and can be customized by changing colors of background and digits.
comments: Awsome Fluid animation, oddly satisfying textures, nice colors. Although being able to customize those colors would gain a fifth star!
Great start Full ambient mode and a date option would get a fifth star.
A mixed bag 3 stars because most are blurry (by design,  I  think). 5 stars for the ones that aren't. The red LCD with green bkgd is a frequent go-to watch face.
A few suggestions 1. Add an option to display the date. 2. Make the seconds smaller.
Amazing Probably one of the best watch faces in my opinion. Simple and a marvel to look at. Keep it up !!!
